name: nodejs-complete
description: 1. psql 2.  psql -U postgres {and enter your psql password} 3. \l {list all db} //CREATE DB 4. CREATE DATABASE db_name; //TO Enter DB 5. \c db_name; // Create Table 6. CREATE TABLE tbl_name(id INT, name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), dob DATE); //view tables in db 7. \d //view schema in table 8. \d tbl_name; // drop table 9. DROP TABLE tbl_name; 10. {Serial and Bigserial, NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY, UNIQUE}
